sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
1. Join a game using the game code from your host
2. Select your character from the available options
3. Wait for the host to start the game
4. Follow the round-by-round instructions

sections.title: During the Game
sections.content:
• Read all of your character's scripts for each round. Some information is to be read AFTER you've been accused, be listening for your cue!
• Click 'I'm Ready' to tell the host you've revealed your information for the round
• Consider motive, means, and opportunity. Who had all three?

sections.title: Role Playing
sections.content:
• Interact with your fellow players. Ask questions and react (in character) to the other players' stories.
• Improvisation and ad libbing are encouraged but not required
• Accents (especially bad ones) are encouraged but not required
• Costumes are encouraged but not required

sections.title: Creating a Game
sections.content:
1. Games will stay live until you end them. You can create a game for a house party one month from now!
2. Tap 'Start New Game' on the home screen
3. Select a mystery from the available options
4. Plan your party! Themed food and drinks? Costumes? Decorations? It's up to you!

sections.title: Sending Invitations
sections.content:
• Send players links with the game code. If desired tell them which character to play.
• Ensure they have downloaded the app
• Ensure that there will be connectivity (wifi or cellular) where you will be playing
• Use the 'Start Game' button when everyone is ready

sections.title: Managing the Lobby
sections.content:
• Monitor who has joined and selected characters
• Help players who are having trouble joining
• If you find yourself short a player or two, you can add 'virtual' players to the game. You will be able to see and read their scripts too.
• Use the 'Start Game' button when everyone is ready

sections.title: During the Game
sections.content:
• In a lull, get someone talking. ex. 'And what do you have to say for yourself?'
• When all players are marked ready, move to the next round

sections.title: Handling Issues
sections.content:
• If a player or hosts disconnects, they can rejoin by selecting the game from 'My Games'
• If needed the host can read a players script for them and/or mark a player as 'Ready' in order to advance to the next round.
• Be patient and help players who are new to the game

sections.title: Game Flow
sections.content:
• When all players are ready, you will be able to advance to the next round
• Final statements are numbered. Guide the players to reveal their final statements in order
• Congratulate the players and discuss the mystery
